data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 23990, Version Hash: ff469eb603f5063014546db12abd89978786c67d
data.actual_result: It acts like you do not have nitro.
data.expected_result: Nitro settings should show your active subscription, paypal email etc.
data.short_description: When clicking Login to Discord on https://discordapp.com/nitro, Nitro menu opens but does not show active subscription.
data.steps_to_repro: - Must have nitro - Must have Discord (app version) open - Must be logged off (anonymous window) **in web browser** - Go to  and click Login To Discord - Your nitro settings should open in your Discord app. - You cannot see your active subscription
